question: Which one of the following oxoacids of phosphorus can reduce <katex>$AgNO_{3}$</katex> to metallic silver?
explanation: Reducing property of phosphorus oxoacids depends on the number of P-H bonds.
**<katex>$H_3PO_2$</katex> (Hypophosphorous acid)** contains two P-H bonds, making it a strong reducing agent capable of reducing <katex>$AgNO_3$</katex> to Ag.
